messages.subject: Re: Did I miss Unschooling on CNN tonight?
messages.msgSnippet: ... Maybe this is kind of showing that it really isn t that big a story - nobody seems to be jumping up and down saying You gotta air this - it s really
messages.messageBody:
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "jlh44music"
<jlh44music@y...> wrote:
>
> Thanks Deb,
> I agree, it's better that it wasn't aired with the stories that were
> done. Someday.
> Jann
>
Maybe this is kind of showing that it really isn't that big a story -
nobody seems to be jumping up and down saying "You gotta air this -
it's really important!" From a national news standpoint, not to
mention international news, it's really a non-issue except insofar as
the established system finds it threatening.

--Deb

messages.subject: Re: Did I miss Unschooling on CNN tonight?
messages.msgSnippet: ... reporters that got shot. I was kind of glad - it would ve been a bit odd having a story on unschooling fall right after the ones on underage prostitutes
messages.messageBody:
> Nope -we watched too. I think it got bumped again because of the two
reporters that got shot. I was kind of glad - it would've been a bit
odd having a story on unschooling fall right after the ones on
underage prostitutes and all that stuff as if to lump it in with
abusing children. It'll pop up one of these days - once the real news
slows down some.>>>>

Thanks Deb,
I agree, it's better that it wasn't aired with the stories that were
done. Someday.
Jann

messages.subject: Re: Did I miss Unschooling on CNN tonight?
messages.msgSnippet: I didn t see it either, although I turned on CNN a little late- about 10:15. Maybe they rescheduled it?
messages.messageBody:
I didn't see it either, although I turned on CNN a little late- about
10:15. Maybe they rescheduled it?

messages.subject: Re: Did I miss Unschooling on CNN tonight?
messages.msgSnippet: ... Nope -we watched too. I think it got bumped again because of the two reporters that got shot. I was kind of glad - it would ve been a bit odd having a
messages.messageBody:
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "jlh44music"
<jlh44music@y...> wrote:

>
> I watched CNN last night and didn't hear ANYTHING about unschooling,
> it was mostly about stories concerning the border between Mexico and
> the US. Did I miss something?
> Jann
>
Nope -we watched too. I think it got bumped again because of the two
reporters that got shot. I was kind of glad - it would've been a bit
odd having a story on unschooling fall right after the ones on
underage prostitutes and all that stuff as if to lump it in with
abusing children. It'll pop up one of these days - once the real news
slows down some.

--Deb

messages.subject: Did I miss Unschooling on CNN tonight?
messages.msgSnippet: ... There was a misunderstanding on the date that was posted before. so you can t find the transcripts because the show hasn t been run yet. ... I watched CNN
messages.messageBody:
> someone posted that the date for this program is tonight JAN 30th.
There was a misunderstanding on the date that was posted before. so
you can't find the transcripts because the show hasn't been run yet.>
> It's on tonight.>>>

I watched CNN last night and didn't hear ANYTHING about unschooling,
it was mostly about stories concerning the border between Mexico and
the US. Did I miss something?
Jann

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] RE: Unschooling on CNN tonight!!
messages.msgSnippet:
someone posted that the date for this program is tonight JAN 30th.  There
was a misunderstanding on the date that was posted before. so you can t find the
messages.messageBody:
someone posted that the date for this program is tonight JAN 30th. There
was a misunderstanding on the date that was posted before.

so you can't find the transcripts because the show hasn't been run yet.

It's on tonight.

Lesa

-------Original Message-------

From: Christy Putnam
Date: 01/29/06 21:43:08
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] RE: Unschooling on CNN tonight!!

I just went to the CNN.com site and it doesn't have the transcript of this
show yet. If anyone gets it before I do, please let me know (or post it to
group if appropriate). I will try to check the site each day and will post
here if I find it. Thanks ya'll!

BTW, I am still in process of reading the replies to my other posts..taking
me a while to digest them, not to mention getting my dh to read them.
Thanks for all your insight and I will comment or come up with more
questions very soon, I am sure!

In Gratitude,

Christy Putnam
Unschooling Mom to Aden (1) and Seth (11)
Loving wife of Chet (ann. 7/4/04)

http://blog.myspace.com/personal_balance

"Go confidently in the direction of your
dreams. Live the life you have always
imagined." - Henry David Thoreau

Message: 2
Date: Fri, 27 Jan 2006 19:10:40 -0000
From: "Ren Allen" <starsuncloud@...>
Subject: Unschooling on CNN tonight!!


FYI
Unschooling topic 10pm EST on CNN (Anderson Cooper 360) "no reading, writing
or math. Exploring alternative education. Tune in at 10 p.m. ET."
(http://www.cnn.com/CNN/Programs/anderson.cooper.360/)

This was posted at UD and AL, just thought I'd share it here too...

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
